column4: yes it does support wep. not wpa. i have to get wpa_supplicant for that and do all the manual configuration

i really don't get it why network manager was implemented this way. the crap doesn't support static ip's, there's virtually 0 configuration options and it overwrites every setting u put in. i can't even retain my dns server ips!!!
you might want to make some design change requests to the developers
there wishlist and buglist is pretty filled up... right from the dapper release
